definitions: something or someone that relieves pain, distress, or difficulty

examples.text: a great game to play as a stress reliever

shortDefinitions: something or someone that relieves pain or difficulty

definitions: a short-acting bronchodilator drug administered by inhalation to relieve acute symptoms of asthma

examples.text: relievers are taken immediately when you experience any asthma symptoms

shortDefinitions: short-acting bronchodilator drug administered by inhalation to relieve acute symptoms of asthma

definitions: a pitcher who enters the game in place of the previous pitcher

examples.text: the team needs a right-handed reliever

shortDefinitions: pitcher who enters game in place of previous pitcher
